စိရဝါသီ（ပု）
[adhiccasamuppanna]
[အဓိစ္စသမုပ္ပန္နနာမ်]
Ciravāsī：The son of Bhadragaka．Bhadragaka visited the Buddha and   told him that he was always anxiously waiting for news of Ciravāsī，who was   away at school．S.iv.329； SA.iii.103.
